name: Old Town Guesthouse

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were lucky enough to stay in Old Town Guesthouse around a week after they opened. It's great value, 25 ringitt per night for a double room with share toilet/shower and fan. They also have rooms with attached shower and air con at a pretty small
reviews.title: Spotlessly clean, supremely friendly guesthouse.

description: Welcome to Old Town Guesthouse, a place where you can feel at home. We’re a budget guesthouse with charm and we are one of the cheapest options because we don’t have staff – we do everything ourselves. Our home is your home – come sit back, relax, and join us for a cup of coffee.
